alert.note: Alert for Butte; Lawrence (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 27 at 3:24PM MDT until May 27 at 4:00PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: The National Weather Service in Rapid City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Butte County in northwestern South Dakota... Northwestern Lawrence County in west central South Dakota... East central Crook County in northeastern Wyoming... * Until 400 PM MDT. * At 324 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Beulah, or 10 miles west of Spearfish, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. * Locations impacted include... northwestern Belle Fourche. This includes... Interstate 90 in South Dakota between Mile Markers 1 and 6. Interstate 90 in Wyoming between Mile Markers 205 and 207. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
